ip-ver-pref.help: On dual stack system the preferred stack: 4 for IPv4 and 6 for IPv6

addr-timeout.help: On dual stack system how long to wait preferred stack's address in seconds

socket-api.help: Enable the lwip socket API (see lwip/sockets.h) e.g. to aid porting of existing code.  You may also want to "#define LWIP_COMPAT_SOCKETS 1" in code using the API.
